thread.section_title: Nebraska Furniture Mart Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nebraska Furniture Mart | nfm.com
thread.title: NATALIE WIRSING
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by NATALIE WIRSING

author: NATALIE WIRSING
title: NATALIE WIRSING
text: Great furniture at amazing prices and unbeatable financing. Their customer service is absolute 5 stars. Every time I've called, I've called I've talked to a human being within 2 minutes! No crazy number punching or talking to a machine. Real people who immediately help you fix real problems.
